titleStmt.title: A Booke of the forme of common prayers, administration of the sacraments, &c. agreeable to Gods Worde, and the vse of the reformed churches. To this fourth editiŏ is added the maner of ordination and admission of a pastor to his charge, according to the maner of the reformed churches. The contents of this booke, are conteyned in the page following..
titleStmt.author: English Church (Middelburg, Netherlands)

notesStmt.note: Title printed within border of printers' ornaments; initial.
Beginning with A₂r, page numbers 1-92 are written in manuscript at the head of each page.
"Cum priuilegio" at foot of title page.
